item.title: Sara add a quote by Phillip Pullman
item.description: "I will love you forever, whatever happens. Till I die and after I die, and when I find my way out of the land of the dead, Iâ€™ll drift about forever, all my atoms, till I find you again . . ." -- Phillip Pullman

item.title: Sara add a quote by Jasper Fforde
item.description: "Take no heed of her.... She reads a lot of books." -- Jasper Fforde

item.title: Sara add a quote by Jasper Fforde
item.description: "Two minds with but a single thought, two hearts that beat as one." -- Jasper Fforde

item.title: Sara add a quote by Jasper Fforde
item.description: "Okay, this is the wisdom. First, time spent on reconnaissanse is never wasted. Second, almost anything can be improved with the addition of bacon. And finally, there is no problem on Earth that can't be ameliorated by a hot bath and a cup of tea." -- Jasper Fforde

item.title: Sara add a quote by Jasper Fforde
item.description: "I'll tell you what love is" I said, "It is blind devotion, unquestioning self humiliation, utter submission, trust and belief against yourself and against the whole world, giving up your heart and soul to the smiter." -- Jasper Fforde

item.title: Sara add a quote by Jasper Fforde
item.description: "Do I have to talk to insane people?" "You're a librarian now. I'm afraid it's mandatory." -- Jasper Fforde

item.title: Sara add a quote by Jasper Fforde
item.description: "Books" - Snell smiled - "are a kind of magic." -- Jasper Fforde

item.title: Sara add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "When the day shall come that we do part," he said softly, and turned to look at me, "if my last words are not 'I love you'-ye'll ken it was because I didna have time." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Sara add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "For where all love is, the speaking is unnecessary. It is all. It is undying. And it is enough." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Sara add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Wicked people never have time for reading. It's one of the reasons for their wickedness." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Sara add a quote by Maud Casey
item.description: "I was born with a reading list I will never finish." -- Maud Casey
